description: "In any case, we should choose soon. Don't want to stand around in the cold." "Right you are, captain." Alvin gazes intently into the trees. "I must say, I hope we're not help up for too long. I've never seen a Sampling before. I feel like I'm going to jump out of my skin." You smile. "Of course, it's more something you hear than something you see. But I admit, I'm excited too. Now, what should we do?"
